message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its quality.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the quality of this item is truly top-notch.  How about we meet halfway between our offers at $160?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $160. How about we try $140?
